aboutSubtitle: Learn more about Hostel 53 and our philosophy of hospitality.
ourStoryText1: Hostel 53 was founded with a simple idea: to provide travelers and students with comfortable, safe, and affordable accommodation in the heart of Bishkek. We understand that every guest is unique, so we strive to create an atmosphere where everyone feels at home.
ourStoryText2: Located in the city center near the Gastello Hotel, our hostel offers the perfect blend of convenience and affordability. We are proud to have created a space where people from all over the world can meet and connect.
joinCommunityText: Become a part of the friendly Hostel 53 family. We are always happy to welcome new guests and are ready to make your stay in Bishkek unforgettable.
contactSubtitle: Get in touch with us through any convenient method.
howToGetHereText1: From the airport: 15 minutes by taxi
howToGetHereText2: From the bus station: 10 minutes by minibus
ourRoomsSubtitle: Choose a room that fits your needs from our wide selection of cozy and clean accommodations.
reviewsSubtitle: See what our guests have to say about their stay.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to the most common questions.
privacyPolicyP1: We collect information you provide directly to us when you make a booking, contact us, or otherwise communicate with us. This may include your name, email, phone number, and booking details.
privacyPolicyP2: We use the information we collect to process your bookings, communicate with you about your stay, respond to your inquiries, and improve our services.
privacyPolicyP3: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing.
privacyPolicyP4: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.
confirmBookingDetails: Please review your booking details before confirming.
carouselSubtitle1: Your home in the heart of Bishkek
whyUsDesc1: In the heart of Bishkek, near all major attractions.
whyUsDesc3: Daily cleaning, comfortable beds, and modern amenities.
whyUsDesc4: Affordable prices without compromising on quality.
offerDesc1: Stay 7+ nights and get a 15% discount.

provideDesc6: We are always here to help you, day or night.

footerDescription: Comfort, coziness, and affordability in the heart of Bishkek.

faq.q: What time is check-in and check-out?
faq.a: Check-in is from 14:00, check-out is until 12:00. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request.
Breakfast is available for an additional fee of 200 som. We also have a fully equipped kitchen where you can prepare your own meals.

faq.q: Do you provide towels and bed linen?
faq.a: Yes, we provide clean bed linen and towels for all guests free of charge. Linen is changed regularly.
No, there is no curfew. You can come and go 24/7. However, we ask guests to be quiet after 22:00 to respect other guests.
Yes, we offer free luggage storage for our guests both before check-in and after check-out.
